name: Receipt of cable containment delivery to site & storage. (ITP Reference Item 1)
Correct cable size & type. (ITP Reference Item 3)
Cable pulling tension to not exceed manufacturer's recommendations. (ITP Reference Item 4)
Cable lubrication if required. (ITP Reference Item 5)
Installed to latest drawings – schematics/single line diagram & cable containment drawings.  (ITP Reference Item 6)
Correct cable tag installed. (ITP Reference Item 7)
Photo evidence captured for cable containment install. (ITP Reference Item 8)
